category-def.name: LOOSE Research Group
category-def.label: LOOSE Research Group
category-def.description: The LOOSE Research Group is focused on the evolution and re-engineering of object-oriented software systems. All research activities of the LOOSE Research Group follow an iterative approach starting with basic research which is then concretized in two directions: on the one hand in the academic field, and on the other hand in collaborations with the industry.
